column4: would you guys recommend something other than WINE for better performance? more specifically for photoshop; i find that the redraw rates are sluggish at best w/ WINE
is htere anything you guys would recommend over WINE for seemless windows integration
yeah im looking for a local solution on my laptop; just essentially have to be able to run photoshop as transparently as possible and w/ decent response
is there a virtualbox version compatible w/ hardy ?
im looking at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/VirtualBox there's no mention of hardy support
yes, there is.  There's the Sun version that's closed source, and the open source one in synaptics
also grab the kernel modules for your kernel
and finally add your username to vboxusers
that might be a little out of my league (kernel modules)
I can help you if you'd like
mind if i msg you real quick ?
you might have to register on the server to privmsg
